articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Kamala Harris begins Africa tour, announces security aid in Ghana - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The US pledged help for Benin, Ghana, Guinea, Ivory Coast and Togo to tackle violent groups and instability.
articles.content: The United States will provide $100m to Ghana and four other West African countries to help them deal with instability and violence from armed groups, Vice President Kamala Harris says during a visit… [+3355 chars]
